attributes.action: abandon plans to introduce cross departmental data sharing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Privacy is not a privilege, it is a birth right and furthermore nobody, not even the state has the right to take that privacy away.

The government seem to be trying a range of privacy busting measures in the hope that one of them will slip through un-noticed.  

I do not want to, nor will I, give up my privacy to the state.
